```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dev.to.ol)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)

dev.to.ol::get_users_articles() %>%
  dplyr::arrange(dplyr::desc(public_reactions_count)) %>%
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  dplyr::select(title,
         url,
         public_reactions_count,
         comments_count,
         page_views_count) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```
